# blastshield_node (Resource)

Manages a Blastshield node.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `node_type` (String)

### Optional

- `address` (String)
- `administrator` (String)
- `api_access` (Boolean)
- `dns_name` (Set of String)
- `endpoint_mode` (String)
- `endpoint_subnet` (String)
- `expires` (Number)
- `groups` (Attributes List) Group memberships with optional expiry. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups))
- `ha_active` (String)
- `master` (String)
- `public_key` (String)
- `tags` (Map of String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `idp_active` (Boolean)
- `idp_auto_created` (Boolean)
- `idp_username` (String)
- `invitation` (String, Sensitive) Base64-encoded JSON of the POST response (contains registration info).

<a id="nestedatt--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups`

Required:

- `id` (Number) Group ID.

Optional:

- `expires` (Number) Expiry timestamp (0 = never).
